You can benefit greatly when you and your family take the time to visit with one another. Your friends are just as important; make it a point to spend time with them as well. If you are not fortunate enough to have friends close to you, consider joining a couple of group organizations that will put you in touch with some folks who like some of the same things you do. If you want to have a very positive effect on your health, smiling and laughing will elevate your mood. When you are in a good mood, it is really easy to smile, but it can also be true with the reverse. By going out of your way to smile, you can start to feel better. When you are feeling down, instead of trying medicine, give laughter a try. This triggers endorphins that are essential for feeling good, and they can also reduce any physical discomfort you might have. When you choose to smile, it results in being happier, and it causes a reaction in people, making them happier, which in turn will affect your social life and job, in a good way. Think about how much you want to be around people who are miserable and never smile, so take a hint from that and start smiling more and people will want to be around you.
